text: Hi all! My team and I are looking for a freelance Frontend Developer to build out a few landing pages for upcoming product launches. You can review the details and apply <https://www.community.co/careers/freelance-front-end-HubSpot-web-developer|here>. Feel free to DM me if you have any questions. Thanks!

Hi, Iâ€™m a Sr Frontend and Backend Developer for over 6 years of experience.
I've worked in many industries include E-Commerce, Real Estate, Education, Booking Systems(Hotel, Travel, Restaurant), Healthcare etc

I am open to a new job and available to start work right away.

Please contact me if you are interested in hiring me or working with me.

Hi everyone! Looking for someone with experience building/customizing HubSpot templates. Specifically, we're looking to customize the "manage preferences" page for our HubSpot install. DM me if you're interested and I can share more details!
